definition: why bother?/is it worth the trouble?

sentences.english: Love you and you will work together, otherwise why bother to take youth gambling tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 愛你纔會和你一起拼搏，不然何苦拿青春賭明天。

sentences.english: Life is tired, why be the feelings of the crime?
sentences.chinese: 生活本來就是累，何苦再受感情的罪？

sentences.english: If we Shanghainese are inhospitable, why would we bother going to these lengths?
sentences.chinese: 如果我們上海人不好客，那又何苦費心這麼做？

sentences.english: A person live in love, why reduced.
sentences.chinese: 線一個人好好過，何苦在愛情裏淪落。

sentences.english: Silly people who abuse, Lang has been fickle without leaving a trace, why bother Yiyi?
sentences.chinese: 癡心的人兒，郎已薄倖無蹤，何苦依依？

sentences.english: If you remove the pleasure from dining, why bother cooking at all?
sentences.chinese: 如果你無視進餐的樂趣，何苦還要麻煩廚師呢？

sentences.english: Say a lie, want to make ten lies to make up for, why bother?
sentences.chinese: 說一句謊話，要編造十句謊話來彌補，何苦呢？

sentences.english: One taradiddle needs ten to make up. Why bother?
sentences.chinese: 說一句謊話，要編造十句謊話來彌補，何苦呢？

sentences.english: But why choose such a thing to become a daily habit?
sentences.chinese: 但何苦把這些事變成習慣呢？

sentences.english: But if so also I am wicked, why have I laboured in vain?
sentences.chinese: 我若是有罪，又何苦白費心血？

sentences.english: Dress cute wherever you go, life is too short to blend in - Paris Hilton
sentences.chinese: 無論到哪兒都要打扮俏麗，生命短暫，何苦從衆。

sentences.english: Foolish girl . ask yourself . All you give for what.
sentences.chinese: 傻女，問問你自己，那些付出是何苦。

definition: to ask for trouble (idiom)/to make a rod for one's own back
to ill-use/to humiliate/to degrade/to ruin/also pr. [zuo2 jian4]
worthwhile (often in rhetorical questions, implying not worthwhile)/also written 犯得上
see 犯不著|犯不着[fan4 bu5 zhao2]
to insist on doing sth/must do it, despite everything
to suffer as a consequence of one's own actions/you asked for it/to bring it on oneself (sth unpleasant)
to bother/to press sb, usu. to do sth/it's a tough job/sorry to bother you (polite, used to thank sb for a favor)
